markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Know-It-All](/Feats.aspx?ID=4607) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=546" />
<trait label="Thaumaturge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=432" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 104 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Oatia Skysage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=199) (Level 10)

**Prerequisites**
[[Bard](/Classes.aspx?ID=3)] [enigma muse](/Muses.aspx?ID=1)

</column>

---

When you succeed at a check to Recall Knowledge, you gain additional information or context. When you critically succeed at a check to Recall Knowledge, you get additional information or context or can ask an additional follow-up question (the GM chooses which).
name: Know-It-All
